title: Koi no Yokan wa Amaku Kaoru - Novel Updates
author: Kurosaki Atsushi
description: Kaoru is the owner of a small cafe called 'Sarasa'. One evening he finds himself at the mercy of one of his customers, and in a desperate bid to find help he is discovered by a random passerby named Seiji. This starts an exciting time in Kaoru's life.>
